div.p: If you haven't ordered your cap and gown yet, do it before the prices go up!
You can print a form using this link. Or you can get one in the main office.
You will need the following information:
Cost for Cap, Gown, Tassel & Custom Stole is $47.25
Payment: cash, check, money order, or credit card. If paying by check or money order, please make payable to Jostens.
Student Name, height, and weight

img.alt: Writers, photographers, reporters - Join our online newspaper, The Eagle's Voice!

div.a: Writers, photographers, reporters - Join our online newspaper, The Eagle's Voice!

div.p: Coming Soon!
new articles on the Eagle's Voice website --

Join our staff.
Email: eaglesvoice@centralreg.k12.nj.us
Or come see Dr. Mueller in room 235 or Ms. Levin in room 230.

If you are a Central student and an aspiring journalist or writer, submit your ideas and articles to The Eagle's Voice. Pieces on school events, national and world events, pop-culture - anything that would be of interest to our student audience is welcome for consideration.

article.a: Read more about Writers, photographers, reporters - Join our online newspaper, The Eagle's Voice!

div.p: Please subscribe to our Youtube Channel.

article.a: Read more about Subscribe to Channel 21

div.p: The Free and Reduced Meal Program application is located in the Parent Portal. You can use your Parent Portal log-in information to find the application under the Meal Application link and complete it online.
If you are having difficulty getting to the Free and Reduced Meal Program application, and feel comfortable providing the information over the phone, please call:
Marie Babich at 732-269-1100 ext. 3221

article.a: Read more about Free and Reduced Meal Program

p.strong:
Central Regional School District will be closed until further notice
to prevent the possible spread of COVID-19.

div.p: Please click the links below for more information.
